name: FoodIndustry
title: Food Industry (preview 2.0)
author: Villfuk02, Oceanel, jonkeda
description:
This mod adds hunger and ways to produce foods and drinks. From grown foods can be obtained effect capsules.
Graphics for composter and basic farm by darkfrei, other farms and mashines by Oceanel51.
New consumption system invented and implemented by Oceanel51, cattles and some trees ideas by jonkeda.
